“H.R. 1112's vague and ambiguous language would discourage our
vets from applying for VA benefits due to fear that they would lose their 2nd amendment rights if they did so.” – Ranking Member @DrPhilRoe #OpposeHR1112 pic.twitter.com/IShdWgDBIw

“H.R. 1112 threatens to take away the 2nd amendment rights
of the brave men & women who risked their lives protecting our
constitutional rights. This bill would strip those rights from veterans
without a single hearing in a courthouse." – Ranking Member @DrPhilRoe pic.twitter.com/OqxbxeMyuU

Today, Ranking Member @DrPhilRoe joined @HouseGOP Members & Second Amendment supporters to defend #2ndAmendment rights. There, Dr. Roe shared how H.R. 1112 specifically threatens #veterans rights. pic.twitter.com/q7YbY8x0e0
